book_details.title: THINGS THAT MATTER
book_details.description: Three decades’ worth of essays from the conservative columnist.
book_details.contributor: by Charles Krauthammer
book_details.author: Charles Krauthammer

book_details.title: KILLING JESUS
book_details.description: The host of "The O'Reilly Factor" recounts the events leading up to Jesus’ execution.
book_details.contributor: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
book_details.author: Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard

book_details.title: THE BULLY PULPIT
book_details.description: The author of “Team of Rivals” explores the relationship between Theodore Roosevelt and William Howard Taft and the activities of the muckraking press.
book_details.contributor: by Doris Kearns Goodwin
book_details.author: Doris Kearns Goodwin

book_details.title: DAVID AND GOLIATH
book_details.description: How disadvantages can work in our favor; from the author of “The Tipping Point” and “Outliers.”
book_details.contributor: by Malcolm Gladwell
book_details.author: Malcolm Gladwell

book_details.title: I AM MALALA
book_details.description: The experience of the Pakistani girl who advocated for women’s education and was shot by the Taliban.
book_details.contributor: by Malala Yousafzai with Christina Lamb
book_details.author: Malala Yousafzai with Christina Lamb

book_details.title: DOUBLE DOWN
book_details.description: Insider reporting on the election of 2012 from the authors of “Game Change.”
book_details.contributor: by Mark Halperin and John Heilemann
book_details.author: Mark Halperin and John Heilemann

book_details.title: SI-COLOGY 1
book_details.description: Tales from Phil’s youngest brother, who works in the Duck Commander workshop.
book_details.contributor: by Si Robertson with Mark Schlabach
book_details.author: Si Robertson with Mark Schlabach

book_details.title: GEORGE WASHINGTON'S SECRET SIX
book_details.description: The story of the Culper spy ring, which aided the American cause during the Revolution.
book_details.contributor: by Brian Kilmeade and Don Yaeger
book_details.author: Brian Kilmeade and Don Yaeger

book_details.title: GOOD TIDINGS AND GREAT JOY
book_details.description: The former vice presidential candidate urges Americans to keep Jesus Christ in Christmas — in public displays, school concerts and their hearts.
book_details.contributor: by Sarah Palin
book_details.author: Sarah Palin

book_details.title: THE DEATH OF SANTINI
book_details.description: In this memoir, Conroy mourns the abusive father on whom “The Great Santini” was based.
book_details.contributor: by Pat Conroy
book_details.author: Pat Conroy

book_details.title: HUMANS OF NEW YORK
book_details.description: Four hundred color photos of New Yorkers, with brief commentary by Stanton.
book_details.contributor: by Brandon Stanton
book_details.author: Brandon Stanton

book_details.title: LEAN IN
book_details.description: The chief operating officer of Facebook urges women to pursue their careers without ambivalence.
book_details.contributor: by Sheryl Sandberg with Nell Scovell
book_details.author: Sheryl Sandberg with Nell Scovell

book_details.title: JOHNNY CARSON
book_details.description: A recollection by Carson's lawyer and confidant for 18 years.
book_details.contributor: by Henry Bushkin
book_details.author: Henry Bushkin

book_details.title: UNDISPUTED TRUTH
book_details.description: The former heavyweight boxing champion looks back on his life and career, from an impoverished boyhood through success, violence, addiction and recovery.
book_details.contributor: by Mike Tyson with Larry Sloman
book_details.author: Mike Tyson with Larry Sloman

book_details.title: THE REASON I JUMP
book_details.description: A 13-year-old boy with autism answers questions.
book_details.contributor: by Naoki Higashida
book_details.author: Naoki Higashida

book_details.title: KILLING KENNEDY
book_details.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the events surrounding the assassination of John F. Kennedy.
book_details.contributor: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
book_details.author: Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard

book_details.title: HAPPY, HAPPY, HAPPY
book_details.description: The Duck Commander pays tribute to "faith, family and ducks."
book_details.contributor: by Phil Robertson with Mark Schlabach
book_details.author: Phil Robertson with Mark Schlabach

book_details.title: HISTORY DECODED
book_details.description: Ten historical mysteries, based on the History Channel show “Brad Meltzer’s Decoded.”
book_details.contributor: by Brad Meltzer with Keith Ferrell
book_details.author: Brad Meltzer with Keith Ferrell

book_details.title: ONE SUMMER
book_details.description: The author of “A Short History of Nearly Everything” describes the events of the summer of 1927: Charles Lindbergh’s trans-Atlantic flight, Babe Ruth’s 60 homers, the great Mississippi flood.
book_details.contributor: by Bill Bryson
book_details.author: Bill Bryson

book_details.title: AN ASTRONAUT'S GUIDE TO LIFE ON EARTH
book_details.contributor: by Chris Hadfield
